Title: Relates to creating the "modernized voter registration act of New York"; modernizes voter registration, promotes access to voting for individuals with disabilities
Summary: Relates to creating the "modernized voter registration act of New York"; modernizes voter registration; promotes access to voting for individuals with disabilities; protects the ability of individuals to exercise the right to vote in elections for local and state office and makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to modernizing voter registration, promoting access to voting for individuals with disabilities, protecting the ability of individuals to exercise the right to vote in elections for local and state office; and making an appropriation therefor
